content:
The avatar 'a' is at row 8, col 2. There is a lever to the left '*' and a lever to the right 'b'. The objective is likely to toggle levers to open a path. Since I have not moved after my last action, I will try to move to the left to interact with the lever.
Action: 1
I will move to the left, hoping to interact with the lever.

The avatar is at (8,1). The goal is to pick up the passenger 'l' at (8,30).
There are walls all around. I need to go right.
Action: 2
I expect to move right and get closer to the lever.```Action: 2```

The avatar is at (8, 2). There are two levers around, one to the left at (8, 1), one to the right at (8, 3). There is also one above at (7, 2) and below at (9, 2). I should interact with one of the levers. I will try to move right to interact with the lever 'b' at (8, 3).
Action: 2

The avatar is at row 8, col 3.
The goal is to pick up the passenger at row 8, col 30.
To reach the passenger, the avatar needs to go right.
Action: 2
I will move right to get closer to the passenger.```Action: 2```

The avatar is at row=8, col=3. To reach the passenger 'l' at row=8, col=30, I need to move right. There is a lever at (8,1) and (9,2). The immediate action should be to move right towards the lever at (8,1) and the passenger at (8,30).
Action: 2

The avatar is at (8,3). There is a leverLeft at (8,1), leverUp at (7,2), leverDown at (9,2). The goal is likely to change the levers so that I can pass. I'll try moving towards the lever first.
Action: 1
I'm trying to move left to reach the lever.

The avatar is at (8,2). There's a lever to the left at (8,1) and another one to the right at (8,3). I should first try to move to the left to flip the lever.
Action: 1
```Feedback: I will move to the left to interact with the lever.```

The avatar is at (8, 1). I need to get to the lever at (9, 2) to toggle it.
Action:3
I will move down to reach the lever. I expect to be at (9, 1).

The avatar 'a' is at (8, 1). There is a lever 'b' at (8, 3). There is also a lever '&' at (9, 2). I should try to move to the right to flip the lever.
Action: 2
I will move right to flip the lever.

The avatar is currently at row 8, col 2. There are levers nearby to the west and east. I should try to move to the west, to interact with the lever.
Action: 1
I expect the avatar to move to the west.

The avatar is currently at row 8, col 1. There is a lever to the right at row 8, col 3. I should move to the right.
Action: 2
I expect to move towards the lever to the right.

The avatar is currently at row=8, col=2. The goal is to get the passenger 'l' who is at row=8, col=30.
The lever is at row=7, col=2. The avatar needs to go left to switch the level and reach the goal.
Action: 1
I will move left to interact with the lever.``` Action: 1 ```
I expect the avatar to move to the left, potentially interacting with the lever at (8,1) or (7,2).

The avatar is at (8,1). There is a lever (leverRight) at (8,3). There is also a leverDown at (9,2). My goal is to change the levers.
I should move towards the lever on the right first.

Action: 2

The avatar is at (8,2). The level has belts, levers, passengers, and deadly zones. My goal is to help the passenger at (8,30) to escape. To do that, I should try to manipulate the levers to open up the path. The lever at (7,2) and (9,2) might be important. I will first try to go up to reach the lever at (7,2).
Action: 4

The avatar is at (7,2). The goal is likely to move the avatar to the right side of the map, potentially to reach the passenger at (8,30). Since the avatar is surrounded by walls on the left, top and bottom, I will move right.
Action: 2
```Action: 2```
I expect the avatar to move one step to the right.
